column4: Hey all. Semi-new Linux user here trying to dual-boot Ubuntu on my new machine (this one), having problems. Anyone care to help?

Ok. I told windows 7 to shrink it's partition space by 500 gigs, which worked- it says there's that much unalocated space. However, when I try to install ubuntu, it says it doesn't have the 2.something gigs it needs, and won't let me proceed.
how did you try to dual boot?
